Looking to identity the serif, please. Big thanks!

 [‹ Gill condensed meets Arial Narrow, rounded....](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054944/http:/typophile.com/node/42057 "Go to previous forum topic") [typefaces used on "absolute vodka" bottle ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054944/http:/typophile.com/node/42050 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ohokay

comments.content: [Feijoa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054944/http:/klim.co.nz/feijoa_samples.php). The clue is Nicholas Felton, who used the typeface on his famous [Annual Report](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054944/http:/feltron.com/index.php?/content/2007_annual_report/).
